What I hate is the comparison game. When my kids come home from their friends house and tell me everything that they got for Christmas! Sorry kid! His family makes more and we have twice as many kids as they do! I get around it by having a rhyme for their gifts : """"something they want, something they need, something to wear, something to read"""". My kids always get pj's on Christmas eve. This is the """"Something to wear"""". This allows me on Christmas morning to bring it back to Christ. Baby Jesus received three gifts. We only give our children 3 gifts Christmas day. Our kids also choose three toys to donate. This year we have gone through 25 days of Christ. It is found online and you hang an ornament representing something from Christ's life and ministry each night after a short devotional. We follow this with family prayer. This has really brought our focus back to what is most meaningful at Christmas. Christ and family time together.

, well said. Christ is love and Christmas time is a wonderful time to embrace this love and to share it. There may be times when we are stressed over time and money, that's when we have to make good choices and do what works best for us. Christmas time will always be a magical time to me.

Thank the Lord for Truth Sayers like Bernie, Trump and Huckabee who have stated this is BAD for Americans--at least the middle class and American Workers. It is great for Big Business and Koch Brothers (who have Fiorina and Rubio on their short list). Congress knows that the TPP is a bad deal for us. They passed the TAA-- this bill takes money out of Social Security to retrain those Americans who will lose their jobs from the Trans Pacific Agreement. Social Security money is not their money! It is supposed to be used by those of us who have worked all our lives and been forced to pay into it. IT IS NOT SUPPOSED TO BE USED TO OFFSET AMERICAN GREED.

This isn't the eastern bloc in the late 80s, when the communist countries all collapsed. This is Venezuela now. A democratic socialist nation, since liberals love to try and differentiate between socialism and democratic socialism. Socialism/Communism has failed every time it's ever been implimented. Not once in history has it ever been sustained. Capitalism on the other hand has led us to a standard of living unsurpassed in all of the world. Our poor live better than most countries middle class, under poverty level families have cars, t.v. with cable, iPhones, and expensive video game systems. Why are morons so intent on destroying the greatest country in the history of the world? Smh
